Articles.Content:
With the addition of Kerbal Experience, I kind of wonder how this will affect the Original 3 Kerbalnauts.

The three guys could be jack of all trades, or be given default assignments, making them a more effective and rounded team.

Something like:

Jeb - Pilot, duh....

Bob-Engineer, high stupidity, fixes the duck tape holding the space craft together

Bill-Scientist, most scared, the least dumb

This sort of setup goes with what we already know with the current 3 orange suits. But who knows, with the additions of KXP, anything can happen with these guys ;D

(just not jeb, he is always a beast )
It would make sense to give then some boosts. Personally, I like to think of Bill as the engineer, and Bob the scientist. I find Bob gets a lot more scared than Bill.
